name: decomposing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
decompose
to decay, or to cause something to decay: The body must have been decomposing for several weeks.
chemistry
  specialized to break, or to break something, into smaller parts: Microbes decompose organic waste into a mixture of methane and carbon dioxide.
